title: How To Train Your FAMILY MILK COW | Milking Cows 101

tasks.task: Training a cow using a stanchion
subtasks: Bolt the cross bar into the stanchion for better control
Secure the chain and two by four to confine the cow
Use a fence post as a backboard for added stability
Tighten the bolts and hooks to ensure the cow cannot escape
Use apple cider vinegar spray to clean the cow and prevent slipping
Position the calf in eye view to encourage milk letdown
Position the cow in the stanchion with her leg behind her
Use commands to guide the cow's movement and behavior
Apply hand milk or pump as per milking routine
Administer a gentle pop or spray if the cow misbehaves
Reward the cow with treats and praise for good behavior
